boardgame.description: Eat brains. Don't get shotgunned._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Zombie Dice, you are a zombie. You want braaains _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; more brains than any of your zombie buddies. The 13 custom dice are your victims. Push your luck to eat their brains, but stop rolling before the shotgun blasts end your turn! Whoever collects 13 brains first wins. Each game takes 10 to 20 minutes and can be taught in a single round._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn, you take three dice from the box and roll them. A brain symbol is worth one point at the end of the round, while footsteps allow you to reroll this particular dice. Shotgun blasts on the other hand are rather bad, cause if you collect three shotgun blasts during your turn, it is over for you and you get no points. After rolling three dice, you may decide if you want to score your current brain collection or if you want to push your luck by grabbing new dice so you have three again and roll once more._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Steve Jackson Games (SJG 131313) Eat brains. Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t get shotgunned. You are a zombie. You want braaains. More brains than any of your zombie buddies. Zombie Dice is fast and easy for any zombie fan to learn, even non-gamers. The 13 custom dice are your victims. Push your luck to eat their brains, but stop rolling before the shotgun blasts end your turn!
Played five times. Silly die roller - very portable time killer.

Steve Jackson Games - Zombie Dice Language: English, rules other languages available Players: 2+ Age: 10+ Duration: 10 to 20 min Weight: 0.180 kg New -- mint condition -- unopened -- still in shrink wrap. Theme: Eat brains. Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t get shotgunned. You are a zombie. You want braaains. More brains than any of your zombie buddies. Zombie Dice is fast and easy for any zombie fan to learn, even non-gamers. The 13 custom dice are your victims. Push your luck to eat their brains, but stop rolling before the shotgun blasts end your turn! See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
Never played.

Steve Jackson Games* Please contact us on selection and quantity. Steve Jackson Games (SJG 131313) $8.49 [Zombie Dice] Steve Jackson Games (SJG 131313B) $8.49 [Zombie Dice Blister Pack] ** Eat brains. Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t get shotgunned. You are a zombie. You want braaains. More brains than any of your zombie buddies. Zombie Dice is fast and easy for any zombie fan (or the whole zombie family). The 13 custom dice are your victims. Push your luck to eat their brains, but stop rolling before the shotgun blasts end your turn! Two or more can play. Each game takes 10 to 20 minutes, and can be taught in a single round.

RESERVED FOR Guy Mullarkey Brand New, factory sealed! A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard Shipping to USA48: $5.95 I will combine shipping to save you money when ordering multiple games. Standard shipping is USPS. Other shipping options are available upon request (Next Day / UPS / FEDEX). Contact for shipping quote. Alaska and Hawaii orders are shipped via USPS. International orders are shipped via USPS First Class (under 4 pounds) or USPS Priority Mail (up to 70 pounds per box). Contact for shipping quote. Orders ship within 1 business day from receipt of payment (5-10 day waiting period on personal checks). Ohio residents will be charged 6.5% sales tax. Thank-you, Mr. B ROCKIN’ B GAMES www.rockinbgames.com mrb.rockinbgames@gmail.com
